src:
YouTube Boyong Platform Mirip Spotify ke Indonesia
06 Nov 2019, 07:32 by Anggoro Suryo Jati - detikInet


Foto: The Verge

Jakarta - YouTube menghadirkan layanan baru di Indonesia, yaitu YouTube Music dan juga YouTube Music Premium, yang merupakan aplikasi dan platform streaming musik.YouTube Music didesain untuk mendengarkan lagu yang sudah tersedia di platform YouTube, yang bisa didengarkan baik dengan ataupun tanpa video. Ini artinya lagu-lagu tersebut bisa didengarkan di latar belakang, tanpa perlu memutar videonya.Tersedia ribuan playlist, stasiun radio artis, lagu cover, pementasan live, dan bermacam video musik lain yang bisa didengarkan lewat YouTube Music, yang merupakan layanan gratis namun didukung iklan. Sementara YouTube Music Premium adalah layanan berbayar tanpa iklan."Tidak semua pengguna mau membayar biaya berlangganan, namun bisa dibilang semua suka musik. Jadi mereka bisa menikmati dengan dukungan iklan, juga yang tanpa iklan," ujar Brandon Bilinski, Group Product Manager at Google dalam telewicara di kantor Google Indonesia, Rabu (5/11/2019).Bilinski pun menyebut kalau mayoritas pemasukan mereka dari layanan ini bakal diberikan ke para kreator kontennya. Karena menurutnya platform yang bagus adalah platform yang bisa memberikan penghasilan kepada para kreatornya.Dalam telewicara yang sama, ada juga Ruuben Van Den Heuvel, Head of Music Content Partnerships (South East Asia, AU/NZ), YouTube and YouTube Go. Ia menyebut pihak YouTube membutuhkan beberapa tahun untuk mengurus copyright video musik di Indonesia.Mereka mengaku sudah menjalin kerja sama dengan berbagai label yang ada di Indonesia, baik major maupun indie. Meski ia mengaku pihaknya membutuhkan proses yang lebih panjang untuk mengurus copyright lagu yang dicover oleh penyanyi lain.Aplikasi YouTube Music tersedia mulai 7 November di Google Play Store dan App Store. Mereka pun memberikan tiga bulan langganan gratis YouTube Music Premium, yang berlaku untuk pengguna yang mendaftar sampai dengan 26 November mendatang, dan bertarif Rp 49 ribu saat nanti sudah mulai berbayar.Selain YouTube Music, YouTube pun menghadirkan YouTube Premium di Indonesia. Biaya berlangganan YouTube Premium mulai dari Rp 59 ribu per bulan, yang mencakup langganan YouTube Music Premium dan pengalaman bebas iklan serta pemutaran video di latar belakang dan download video. Simak Video "Kerap Bikin Video Menggelitik, Aming Bakal Bikin Akun YouTube"[Gambas:Video 20detik](asj/fay)
text:
YouTube Boyong Platform Similar to Spotify to Indonesia
Nov 6 2019, 07:32 by Anggoro Suryo Jati - detikInet


Photo: The Verge

Jakarta - YouTube presents a new service in Indonesia, namely YouTube Music and also YouTube Music Premium, which is a music streaming application and platform. YouTube Music is designed to listen to songs that are already available on the YouTube platform, which can be heard either with or without video. This means that the songs can be listened to in the background, without the need to play the video. There are thousands of playlists, artist radio stations, cover songs, live performances, and various other music videos that can be listened to through YouTube Music, which is a free but ad-supported service. . While YouTube Music Premium is a paid service without advertising. "Not all users want to pay subscription fees, but you can say that all of them like music. So they can enjoy it with advertising support, also those without advertising," said Brandon Bilinski, Group Product Manager at Google in telewicara at the Google Indonesia office, Wednesday (11/05/2019). Bilinski also said that the majority of their revenue from this service will be given to the creators of the content. Because according to him, a good platform is a platform that can provide income to its creators. In the same teleconference, there was also Ruuben Van Den Heuvel, Head of Music Content Partnerships (South East Asia, AU / NZ), YouTube and YouTube Go. He said YouTube needed several years to take care of music video copyright in Indonesia. They claimed to have collaborated with various labels in Indonesia, both major and indie. Although he admitted that his party needed a longer process to take care of the copyright of songs covered by other singers. The YouTube Music application is available starting November 7 on the Google Play Store and App Store. They also provide a free three-month YouTube Music Premium subscription, which applies to users who register until November 26, and will pay Rp. 49 thousand when they start paying. In addition to YouTube Music, YouTube also presents YouTube Premium in Indonesia. YouTube Premium subscription fees start from Rp. 59 thousand per month, which includes a YouTube Music Premium subscription and an ad-free experience as well as video playback in the background and video downloads. Check out the video "Often making tickling videos, Aming will make a YouTube account" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (asj / fay)
